task_description:
# AI Tweet Rewriter

Add AI-powered tweet rewriting that takes the current tweet and generates 3-5 improved versions. Maintains the core message while optimizing for engagement.

## Rationale
AI content generation is expected in 2024+ but competitor AI is criticized for not matching user voice. Position as an 'improvement' tool rather than 'replacement'.

## User Stories
- As a creator, I want AI to suggest improved versions so that I can choose the best one
- As a time-constrained user, I want quick alternatives so that I don't have to rewrite from scratch

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Generates 3-5 alternative versions of any tweet
- [ ] Each version shows its predicted score
- [ ] Users can select a version or blend ideas
- [ ] Rewriting preserves the core message and intent
